name: César Diego Ruiz
description: César Diego Ruiz, nicknamedEl César, is a street brawler and member of theValentinosinCyberpunk 2077. By 2077, César had already married Micaela, who eventually became pregnant with the couple's first child while César made a name for himself asHeywood's best fist-fighter. However, he wasn't the savviest with money and spent a good chunk of it on buyingcyberwareand customizing aVillefort Alvaradohe liked to callVato. This frivolous spending resulted in constant arguments with Micaela. DuringBeat on the Brat,Vwill fight César, who, due to his needs for money, decides to also bet his car. If V...
